description: This file defines the RDKShell interface and related classes for a plugin-based system managing client applications, including event handling, client management, and various control methods.

classes.name: RDKShell
classes.description: Main plugin class managing application lifecycle, event handling, and client interactions within the RDK platform.

classes.name: RdkShellListener
classes.description: Event listener class for handling RDKShell-specific events like application launch, suspend, focus, and system notifications.

classes.name: MonitorClients
classes.description: Notification handler for monitoring plugin client states and lifecycle events.

classes.name: ScreenCapture
classes.description: Implements screen capture functionality, including capturing image data.

classes.name: TaskQueue
classes.description: A thread-safe queue to manage asynchronous tasks for the RDKShell operations.

classes.name: PluginStateChangeData
classes.description: Tracks plugin state changes and manages connection lifecycle events.

methods.name: notify
methods.description: Sends an event notification with given parameters.

methods.name: pluginEventHandler
methods.description: Handles plugin-specific events based on incoming parameters.

methods.name: launchRequestThread
methods.description: Launches a thread to process RDKShell API requests asynchronously.

methods.name: moveToFrontWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for moving a client window to the front.

methods.name: moveToBackWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for moving a client window to the back.

methods.name: moveBehindWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for moving a client window behind another.

methods.name: setFocusWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for setting focus on a client.

methods.name: getFocusedWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving the currently focused client.

methods.name: killWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for killing a client application.

methods.name: addKeyInterceptWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for adding a key intercept for a client.

methods.name: addKeyInterceptsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for adding multiple key intercepts.

methods.name: removeKeyInterceptWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for removing a key intercept.

methods.name: addKeyMetadataListenerWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for adding key metadata listeners.

methods.name: removeKeyMetadataListenerWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for removing key metadata listeners.

methods.name: injectKeyWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for injecting a key event.

methods.name: getZOrderWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for obtaining Z-order of clients.

methods.name: getScaleWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving scale of a client.

methods.name: setScaleWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for setting scale of a client.

methods.name: getHolePunchWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for getting hole punch status.

methods.name: getSystemMemoryWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving system memory info.

methods.name: showFullScreenImageWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for showing full screen image.

methods.name: hideFullScreenImageWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for hiding full screen image.

methods.name: launchFactoryAppShortcutWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for launching factory app shortcut.

methods.name: getKeyRepeatsEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for fetching key repeat enable status.

methods.name: getVirtualDisplayEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for checking virtual display status.

methods.name: getLastWakeupKeyWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving last wakeup key.

methods.name: getLogsFlushingEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for checking logs flush status.

methods.name: getBlockedAVApplicationsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving AV blocked applications.

methods.name: getGraphicsFrameRateWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving graphics frame rate.

methods.name: setGraphicsFrameRateWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for setting graphics frame rate.

ctags.name: Name
ctags.pattern: /^                virtual const TCHAR* Name() const override { return "ScreenCapture"; }$/
